name: SkiFree 2: Crimson Blizzard
description:
The promising career of a young prodigious skier is cut short by a devil in the mountains. Now, decades later, he seeks his revenge...

If the cut scene doesn't play on loading and you see a start screen, try refreshing the page.

This is the product of one of the required courses for my major, an introduction to making a 2D game in Unity.
